content.text: Royal Signs & Awnings is your trusted Katy, TX outdoor signs provider. We design and install durable, eye-catching exterior signage that helps your business get noticed.
From monument signs to pole signs, channel letters to building signs, our outdoor signage solutions are built to withstand Texas weather while maintaining their visual impact.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for your Free Consultation!

Your outdoor signs are often the first impression customers have of your business. Make it count with professional signage from Royal Signs & Awnings. We create custom exterior signs that reflect your brand identity and attract attention.
Our outdoor signs are manufactured using high-quality materials and proven techniques to ensure longevity and visual appeal.
We offer a complete range of outdoor signage including monument signs, pole signs, pylon signs, channel letters, building signs, and more. Whatever your exterior signage needs, we have the solution.
Contact Royal Signs & Awnings for a free outdoor signage consultation. We'll help you choose the right signs to maximize your visibility and attract more customers.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings at (281) 645-9935 for your Free Consultation!
